title: Typhoon impacts logistics in Taiwan
snippet: Severe weather warning for Hsinchu. Manufacturing and port operations likely disrupted for 48 hours.

title: Port Strike declared in Melbourne, Australia
snippet: Union announces 24-hour stoppage at major container terminal. Expect shipment delays.

title: Power Grid Failure in Sao Paulo, Brazil
snippet: Massive blackout affecting industrial zones. Security systems running on backup power.
